Text:
This is not a horror film IMO, it is one of the most psychologicaly disturbing films I have ever seen. Well top 5 for sure. Its a must see for any true movie buff, the filming is supurb as is everythibng else about this film.
      Try Cannible Holocost for a TRUEunsung horror masterpieace^^
thanks for that info Silkenrune...this movie is classed as a horror ..even the movie poster [above] says horror :)
